componentConfiguration.title: Accordion
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Accordion is a vertically stacked list of headers that allows users to reveal or hide related sections of content.

componentConfiguration.title: Action Sheet
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Action Sheet is a context menu that overlays content, requires manual dismissal, and offer related choices to the current context

componentConfiguration.title: Alert
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Alert is the most urgent notification, demanding immediate attention and persisting until dismissed by the user. It conveys important information and warnings.

componentConfiguration.title: Avatar
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Avatar is a circular component that visually represents a user or object, utilizing images, icons, or text/initials for clear identification.

componentConfiguration.title: Badge
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Badge is a small, helpful element used to display numeric values or icons, providing additional information or visual hint to complement other components.

componentConfiguration.title: Button
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Button allows users to perform actions and make choices with a single tap, such as submitting forms and triggering actions.

componentConfiguration.title: Calendar
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Calendar is a picker interface that simplifies date selection, featuring paginated columns for years, months, and days.

componentConfiguration.title: Card
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Card is a container for displaying content related to a subject or group, offering structured layouts for various elements.

componentConfiguration.title: Chart
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Chart visually represents data using diverse chart types, providing valuable insights into trends and patterns for enhanced data comprehension.

componentConfiguration.title: Chart Stock
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Chart Stock visually illustrates historical security prices over time, utilizing a time-based x- axis and a price-based y-axis.

componentConfiguration.title: Checkbox
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Checkbox enables users to independently select multiple options from a set, offering flexible control for choosing preferences.

componentConfiguration.title: Colors
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Colors serve as a repository for Kirby's brand colors, guaranteeing uniform and harmonious color usage.

componentConfiguration.title: Data Table
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Data Table displays extensive volumes of intricate data in a well-organized, tabular format for comprehensive information presentation.

componentConfiguration.title: Divider
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Divider is a subtle line utilized to distinguish and visually organize elements or content sections

componentConfiguration.title: Dropdown
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Dropdown displays multiple choices for user selection and appears upon interaction with an element.

componentConfiguration.title: Empty State
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Empty State is presented when no content is available, offering user-friendly guidance and clear messaging to assist users in such situations.

componentConfiguration.title: FAB
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Floating Action Button is a circular button positioned in the lower right corner, symbolizing the primary action.

componentConfiguration.title: Flag
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Flag is a color-coded element used to emphasize or aid interpretation of information.

componentConfiguration.title: Fonts
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Fonts provide a showcase of the Kirby font set, demonstrating typography styles to maintain consistency and establish a visual identity.

componentConfiguration.title: Form Field
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Form Field is an interactive input element that enables users to enter and edit information.

componentConfiguration.title: Header
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Header is positioned at the top of a page, offering essential page context in a straightforward and topic-relevant manner.

componentConfiguration.title: Icons
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Icons have a rounded and friendly style, used to represent actions and functions within components.

componentConfiguration.title: Item
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Item is a versatile placeholder that can contain various content elements, used for structuring other components.

componentConfiguration.title: Menu
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Menu appears on button interaction, offering relevant choices without permanent UI occupation.

componentConfiguration.title: Page
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Page is a layout container for Kirby applications, featuring header and footer sections with responsive design.

componentConfiguration.title: Progress Circle
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Progress Circle is a circular visualization that shows the ongoing progress of an operation or activity.

componentConfiguration.title: Radio Button
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Radio Button allows users to make a single selection from a set of options, with the selection of one option automatically deselecting the others.

componentConfiguration.title: Range Slider
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Range Slider allows users to select values or ranges within a predefined minimum and maximum range.

componentConfiguration.title: Segmented Control
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Segmented Control is a horizontal row of buttons used for toggling between related choices within content.

componentConfiguration.title: Slide Button
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Slide Button provides a simple and intuitive way for users to perform verification actions.

componentConfiguration.title: Slides
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Slides is a collection of cards or content that users can navigate horizontally by swiping or clicking.

componentConfiguration.title: Spinner
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Spinner is a visual indicator that shows ongoing loading processes or actions.

componentConfiguration.title: Toast
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Toast is a subtle notification that gives immediate feedback to users after taking an action.

componentConfiguration.title: Toggle
componentConfiguration.paragraph: Toggle is an input control for binary options, commonly used for managing choices and switches.
